channel.description: Note This portion is no longer part of the Lab 4 assignment, but I left it here because it is interesting to know that it can be done. –Russ Resources How to Configure Ubuntu Linux Server as a Domain Controller with Samba-tool by Jack Wallen on TechRepublic Samba Not Starting on Ubuntu Server 16.10 from StackExchange How to Disable Systemd-resolved in Ubuntu from AskUbuntu Video Transcript In this video, I’ll show you how to set up an Ubuntu VM to act as a Windows Active Directory Domain Controller using Samba.
